titleStmt.title: A confutation of the Popish transubstantiation Together with a narration, how that the masse was at sundrie times patched and peeced by sundrie Popes. Wherein is contained a briefe summe of the reasons and arguments which those render, that will not receiue the masse. Translated out of French into English by Peter Allibond minister of the word of God.

notesStmt.note: Only the "Briefe summe" is by de l'Espine.--STC.

"A short summe of the reasons and arguments that those render, which will not receiue the masse" is a translation of Jean de L'Espine's: "Sommaire des raisons que rendent ceux qui ne veulent pas participer à la messe".
